meanings.definition: To evoke a feeling or reaction
meanings.sent1: The movie's happy ending was so arousing that it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The touching speech by the principal aroused emotions in the audience.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was so arousing that it left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The music had an arousing effect on the crowd, making them dance uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The surprise party was an arousing event that brought tears of joy to everyone.

meanings.sent1: The thrilling roller coaster ride was so arousing that it left everyone exhilarated.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious book had an arousing plot that kept readers hooked until the end.
meanings.sent3: The new video game was so arousing that it became the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The beautiful artwork had an arousing effect on the viewers, leaving them mesmerized.
meanings.sent5: The adventurous treasure hunt was an arousing experience for all the participants.
